description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch, bounce, and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.abilityName: Gomu Gomu no Rocket Slingshot Combo
abilityReveals.description: Luffy stretches his body to create a giant slingshot that can launch allies (in this case, Ace) at enemies with tremendous force. This creative application demonstrates Luffy's inventive use of his rubber body for combination attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: During the tiger battle, Luffy transforms his body into a slingshot while Sabo distracts the tiger. Ace crouches into the slingshot, and Luffy launches him forward, allowing Ace to deliver the finishing blow to the tiger.
